databaseChangeLog.changeSet:
User setting: end study session after being away (tab hidden) for this many minutes. Default 5. Used for pause/resume and auto-end.
<addCheckConstraint tableName="user_settings" constraintName="chk_session_auto_end_away_minutes" checkConstraint="session_auto_end_away_minutes >= 1 AND session_auto_end_away_minutes <= 120"/>
